xml.brief: Get list of pending reports for a geocache

desc.p: Retrieve a list of pending reports for a geocache, i.e. reports that are either unassigned or in progress.

returns.p: An array of the IDs of all pending reports for the given cache_code. An empty array if there are no peding reports for this geocache.
If the given cache code does not exist, the method will respond with an HTTP 400 error.
